item.title: When i post server in server stauts it says it offline and no 1 can log on?
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

is alvaroboldo@hotmail.com
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 05:53:28 PM[/size][hr]to add commands use this steps:

Open your client>search for yell

then after the last } post this

For a teleport command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name")
	{
		teleportToX = cordX;
		teleportToY = cordY;
	}

for a item command add this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name"))
{
sendMessage("Menssage to be sennd when you use this command");
addItem(item ID,Amount);
}

you can add more addItem(item ID,Amount); if you want
